post:
Turf Hosting - VPS Packages

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Code: My Turf Got Rammed - Adds 1GB of ram to your Guaranteed Ram, and your Burstable(vswap) ram. (Done manually after order)

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Turf Hosting provides high quality virtual private servers that include cPanel + WHM. Every VPS comes fully managed with the initial server configuring, optimizing, hardening, ect.. Our virtual servers are aimed for businesses with large websites who need something more powerful than shared hosting, but not a dedicated server. Our virtual servers are also a great solution for web hosting companies who need an upgrade from reseller hosting. 

VPS Features:

  • Fully Managed
  • Free  cPanel + WHM 
  • Server secured, hardened, optimized, and setup within 24 hours (Average 4 hours)
  • Raid Protected Sata Hard Drives
  • Fast CPU (2.9ghz quad core)
  • Full Root Access
  • Free Setup
  • SolusVM Control Panel 
  • OpenVZ Kernel
  • Burstable and Dedicated Ram
  • Boot, Reboot, Install, Change Hostname, Bandwidth Graphs, Shutdown, Change password, Backup, all done through SolusVM Client Panel.
  • Scale(upgrade) when needed.
  • 99.99% UPTIME GUARANTEE
